answers.answer: They will probably put you on meds to help control it. The same happened with me, had high bp but my urine test for protein came back fine. I was prescribed labetalol at 13weeks that I take daily to keep my bp down. They still monitor me closely to make sure I dont develop preeclampsia. I'm 32+5 now.
Same happened to me but my pressure is a little higher then yours and they have not done one thing for me. I have been tested more then once for protein at 34 weeks and I am 37 weeks and 3 days now.

question: So...it doesnt look like I have preeclampsia at all. There is now no protein in my urine and my platelet level is normal. However, I still have a high blood pressure. Today it was 151/90. She scheduled me to come in on thursday but im just curious as to what they will have to do if it doesnt go down. Im 35 weeks 2 days.
title: high blood pressure
